name: Jissen! Mahjong Shinan
overview: Jissen! Mahjong Shinan ("Combat! Mahjong Guide") is a four-way mahjong game for the Super Famicom developed by frequent mahjong game developer Syscom for the Japanese magazine publishing giant ASK. The game offers multiple modes for the player's created character to pursue, and a rogue's gallery of opponents to test their wits against.
